content.text: Count Number of Words in a String
You can easily count the number of words in a string with the following example:
content.html: You can easily count the number of words in a string with the following example:

content.code:
String
words
=

"One Two Three Four"
;


int
countWords
=
words
.
split
(
"\\s"
)
.
length
;


System
.
out
.
println
(
countWords
)
;
content.code_html:
String words = "One Two Three Four";
int countWords = words.split("\\s").length;
System.out.println(countWords);
